description: The challenge focused on assessing asset health, a critical aspect of industrial remote monitoring and diagnostics. The training data provided insights into various maintenance activities, each categorized by one of 14 unique codes. Two main tasks were identified: firstly, classifying whether a failure would happen within the next 1, 2, or 3 time units; and secondly, predicting the number of time units until failure.

target_labels: Will fail within 3, 2 or 1 time units

use.description: Level of known use along the time
